content:
The third separate storm brigade released epic footage of night hunting for the invaders during the battles in Avdiivka.

The forces of defense repelled numerous assaults in several operational directions of the front.

The air defense has shot down 38 Shahaneda, which the invaders continue to launch in Ukrainian cities overnight.

And in Russia, infrastructure objects that the enemy engage in military aggression continue to explode.

These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - Junior Lieutenant Sergey Lipko and Senior Lieutenant Artem Golub.
title: Strike on Russian infrastructure, 38 "Shahanedov" per night, reflected enemy storms: Star from the city in the east
description: The forces of defense repelled numerous assaults in several operational directions of the front. ...
author: Army Inform
